label: Frable, Benjamin, Carole C. Baldwin, Brendan Luther & Lee A. Weigt.  2013. A new species of western Atlantic lizardfish (Teleostei: Synodontidae: Synodus) and resurrection of Synodus bondi Fowler, 1939, as a valid species from the Caribbean with redescriptions of S. bondi, S. foetens (Linnaeus, 1766) and S. intermedius (Spix and Agassiz 1829). Fishery Bulletin 111(2): 122-146.
